name: Underwater Ring Toss Remastered
description:
Underwater Ring Toss like game made for the One Minute Game Jam #7 by Nathanael Green/Wafflgeasm.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For the best experience, play in fullscreen. 

Use A/D to move left and right. The plastic rings in the bubble stream will be blown into the air, try to land the rings on the pegs, the higher pegs award more points. :D
